name: Portobello Mushroom Sliders
author: jdetor
summary: Made with portobello mushrooms, these sliders are a perfect appetizer or snack. Absolutely delicious. Add your favorite cheese.
ingredients: ½ cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Wash mushrooms and pat dry with a paper towel
Slice off stems and slice mushrooms in half so that you have 2 pieces, almost like a hamburger bun
Soak mushrooms in soy sauce for 2 hours
While mushrooms soak, mix turkey, bread crumbs, ketchup, mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper together in a bowl
Heat oil on a griddle over medium heat
Cook turkey patties on the hot griddle until browned and no longer pink in the centers, 5 to 7 minutes per side
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat
Cook mushrooms, cut-sides down, covered, until tender, 5 to 7 minutes
To serve, place turkey patties in between 2 pieces of mushroom
